sourcesContent:
<ion-header [translucent]="true">
    <ion-toolbar>
        <ion-title>
            Otros Componentes
        </ion-title>
    </ion-toolbar>
</ion-header>

<ion-content [fullscreen]="true">
    <ion-list>
        <ion-item *ngFor="let item of lista" [routerLink]="item.path" detail slot="start">
            <ion-icon [name]="item.icono"></ion-icon>
            <ion-label class="ion-padding">{{item.texto}} </ion-label>
        </ion-item>
    </ion-list>




</ion-content>
